data.description: The scope of this document is limited to the Enabler Release Definition of CMR according to OMA Release process and the Enabler Release specification baseline listed in section 5.

This Requirements Document (RD) contains use cases and defines the requirements for the Customized Multimedia Ringing Enabler. The functional areas covered in this RD are described in section 6.1-Modularisation. The Customized Multimedia Ringing Enabler will reuse as much as possible existing technologies and define the new reusable building blocks to be able to create Customized Multimedia Ringing based/enabled services.
